```{r}
library(JADE)
# model is X = SA'

  # simulate data
S <- cbind(rt(1000, 4), rnorm(1000), runif(1000))
A <- matrix(rnorm(9), ncol = 3)
X <- S %*% t(A)

  # jd methods
cov <- acf(X, lag.max = 12, type = "covariance", plot = F)
corrs <- rbind(cov$acf[2,,1], cov$acf[2,,2], cov$acf[2,,3])
for (i in 2:12) {
  corrs <- rbind(corrs, cov$acf[i+1,,1])
  corrs <- rbind(corrs, cov$acf[i+1,,2])
  corrs <- rbind(corrs, cov$acf[i+1,,3])
}
rjd(corrs)

  # ica
SOBI(X)

```
